result.title: CODEFORCES IS HOMOPHOBIC!!!
result.content:
UPD: the word was unblocked. But still neither explanation nor apologies. CF admins, are you sure that you want to ignore 150+ members of the community?

Hi guys!

I was looking for CF bugs (look at my blog â€” it's my hobby) and found that it is impossible to search word "gay" at CodeForces! This word is surely blocked for searching!!! I think it is such a shame in XXI century to be homophobic!!!

Hope admins will be wise enough to bring their apologies to whole mankind. If they really regret they should also rainbow their logo or rename to GayForces or hold a Pride Round or something like that. VOTE UP IF YOU AGREE!!

Anyway I am really touched with this flagrant issue and can't continue using CF anymore. Goodbye!

Love wins,
M.
